update.foreach:
UPDATE device SET
client_id = #{device.clientId},
app_id = #{device.appId},
device_identification = #{device.deviceIdentification},
device_name = #{device.deviceName},
device_description = #{device.deviceDescription},
device_status = #{device.deviceStatus},
connect_status = #{device.connectStatus},
is_will = #{device.isWill},
product_identification = #{device.productIdentification},
device_version = #{device.deviceVersion},
device_sn = #{device.deviceSn},
ip_address = #{device.ipAddress},
activated_time = #{device.activatedTime},
last_online_time = #{device.lastOnlineTime},
mac_address = #{device.macAddress},
active_status = #{device.activeStatus},
extension = #{device.extension},
parent_identification = #{device.parentIdentification},
update_by = #{device.updateBy}, update_time = #{device.updateTime} WHERE id = #{device.id}

mapper.select:
select
from device
and client_id=#{clientId}
order by device_identification asc

#{item}

from device where product_identification=#{productIdentification} and device_identification=#{deviceIdentification} limit 1

select

and device_identification in
#{item}
select count(*) from device

SELECT
FROM device

SELECT d.id, d.device_identification, d.product_id, d.batch_id, d.device_sn, d.ip_address, d.device_version, d.device_os_version, d.activated_time, d.last_online_time, d.mac_address, d.status, d.created_by, d.created_time, d.updated_by, d.updated_time FROM dm_device d
and d.deviceIdentification in
#{deviceIdentification}
ORDER BY d.updated_time DESC

select sum(case when connect_status = 'ONLINE' then 1 else 0 end) as onlineStatusAmount, sum(case when (connect_status = 'OFFLINE' or connect_status is null) then 1 else 0 end) as offlineStatusAmount from device

select sum(case when device_type = 'COMMON' then 1 else 0 end) as commonDeviceAmount, sum(case when device_type = 'GATEWAY' then 1 else 0 end) as gatewayDeviceAmount, sum(case when device_type = 'SUBSET' then 1 else 0 end) as subsetDeviceAmount from device
select sum(case when active_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as activatedAmount, sum(case when active_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as inactivatedAmount from device
